TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PeerCollaborationPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class PeerCollaborationPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class PeerCollaborationPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type PeerCollaborationPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 指定定義或使用於 物件權限的值。

span.span: Specifies the values that define or are used in object permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值允許所有本機和內部網路區域的應用程式來存取共同作業服務，且沒有權限會授與網際網路區域應用程式。The default allow all local and Intranet zone applications to access collaboration services, and no permission is granted for Internet zone applications. 換句話說，如果預設沒有權限已變更，所有連結-本機和網站-本機應用程式能夠存取對等共同作業服務，但全域應用程式沒有存取權。In other words, if the default permissions are not changed, all link-local and site-local applications have access to Peer-To-Peer collaboration services, but global applications have no access. 此類別不是可衍生的。This class is not derivable.

span.span: One of the values in the enumeration.

summary.span: 初始化 的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the .

summary.span: 當呼叫建構函式時，會傳遞這個執行個體的初始 。

span.span: The initial for this instance is passed when the constructor is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類型的執行個體沒有存取權的權限所保護的資源，或是它們不受限制的完整存取這些資源。Instances of this type either have no access to the resource(s) protected by the permission, or they have unrestricted full access to those resources. 如果狀態為 「 ，則執行個體將傳遞所有的需求。If state is , the instance passes all demands. 如果狀態包含任何其他值，執行個體失敗的所有要求。If state contains any other value, the instance fails all demands.

span.span: Creates and returns a copy of the current .

returns.span: ，包含 目前執行個體的複本。

span.span: A that contains a copy of the current instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份執行個體授與相同資源的存取權與原始的權限。A copy of a instance grants the same access to resources as the original permission.

span.span: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the permission.

summary.span: 代表用於編碼安全性物件的 XML 物件模型。

span.span: Represents the XML object model for encoding security objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別被要為簡單 XML 物件模型以便使用於安全性系統，而不做為一般的 XML 物件模型的輕量型實作。This class is intended to be a lightweight implementation of a simple XML object model for use within the security system, and not for use as a general XML object model. 這個類別無法被繼承。This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.IPermission Intersect (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission
public: override System::Security::IPermission ^ Intersect(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);
abstract member Intersect : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission override this.Intersect : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前使用權限形成交集之 使用權限。

span.span: Permission to with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前 和指定之 使用權限交集而成的使用權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: 新的使用權限，表示目前 和指定之 使用權限的交集。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，則這個新的使用權限是 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: This new permission is a reference ( in Visual Basic) if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會說明兩者所共同描述的作業集合的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求將會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 下列陳述式必須是`true`為所有實作方法。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the method. X 和 Y 代表不是物件參考`null`參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)。X and Y represent object references that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - X.Intersect(X) 傳回值等於 X。X.Intersect(X) returns a value equal to X. - X.Intersect(Y) 傳回 Y.Intersect(X) 相同的值。X.Intersect(Y) returns the same value as Y.Intersect(X). - X.Intersect (`null`參考) 會傳回`null`參考。X.Intersect(a `null` reference) returns a `null` reference.

exception.span: 目標參數不是 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )，而且不是和目前使用權限物件相同類別的執行個體。

span.span: The target parameter is not a reference ( in Visual Basic) and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool IsSubsetOf (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean
public: override bool IsSubsetOf(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);
abstract member IsSubsetOf : System.Security.IPermission -> bool override this.IsSubsetOf : System.Security.IPermission -> bool

param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前 是否為指定之 使用權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前的 是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前是所指定權限的子集，如果目前的使用權限會指定一組完全包含在指定的權限的作業。The current is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，代表權限的權限 」*C:\example.txt*「 」 表示存取權限的子集*c:\\*"。For example, a permission that represents access to "*C:\example.txt*" is a subset of a permission that represents access to "*C:\\*". 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. 下列陳述式必須是`true`為所有實作方法。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the method. X、 Y 和 Z 代表不是物件`null`參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)。X, Y, and Z represent objects that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - 傳回 X.IsSubsetOf(X) `true`。X.IsSubsetOf(X) returns `true`. - X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 傳回 Y.IsSubsetOf(X) 相同的值，如果且只有 X 和 Y 代表相同的權限集。X.IsSubsetOf(Y) returns the same value as Y.IsSubsetOf(X) if and only if X and Y represent the same set of permissions. - 如果兩者都傳回 X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 和 Y.IsSubsetOf(Z) `true`，傳回 X.IsSubsetOf(Z) `true`。If X.IsSubsetOf(Y) and Y.IsSubsetOf(Z) both return `true`, X.IsSubsetOf(Z) returns `true`. 如果 X 表示空[IPermission](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkID=98303)權限的無狀態的物件和 Y 代表 IPermission 物件`null`參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)，X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 傳回`true`。If X represents an empty [IPermission](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkID=98303) object with a permission state of None and Y represents an IPermission object that is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), X.IsSubsetOf(Y) returns `true`. 如果 Z 也是空的權限，複合設定作業 X.Union(Z)。也會傳回 IsSubsetOf(Y)`true`因為的兩個空的權限是空的權限。If Z is also an empty permission, the compound set operation X.Union(Z).IsSubsetOf(Y) also returns `true` because the of two empty permissions is an empty permission.

exception.span: 參數為 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: The parameter is a reference ( in Visual Basic).

summary.span: 傳回值，指定目前的 是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value specifying whether the current is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果目前的權限不受限制，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

span.span: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情況下，權限類別方法會由基礎結構，並不適用於應用程式中使用。In general, permission class methods are used by the infrastructure and are not intended for use in applications.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.IPermission Union (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission
public: override System::Security::IPermission ^ Union(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);
abstract member Union : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission override this.Union : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立目前 和指定之 使用權限聯集而成的使用權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: 新的使用權限，表示目前 和指定之使用權限的 。

span.span: A new permission that represents the of the current and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是代表由目前的所有作業的權限及指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current and the specified permission. 任何通過其中之一權限的需求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 下列陳述式必須是`true`為所有實作的聯集的方法。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the Union method. X 和 Y 代表不是物件`null`參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)。X and Y represent objects that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - X.Union(X) 傳回的物件具有相同的 X 值。X.Union(X) returns an object that has the same value as X. - X.Union(Y) 傳回的物件具有 Y.Union(X) 所傳回的物件相同的值。X.Union(Y) returns an object that has the same value as the object returned by Y.Union(X). - X.Union (`null`參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)) 會傳回具有相同的 X 值的物件。X.Union(a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)) returns an object that has the same value as X.

exception.span: 參數為 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: The parameter is a reference ( in Visual Basic).
